front.title: Mobile IPv6 Deployment Scenarios for Broadband Wireless Access Networks

abstract.t: This document describes Mobile IPv6 deployment scenarios for Broadband Wireless Access (BWA) network such as IEEE 802.16 standard. It lists questions that Internet Service Provider (ISP) should consider when they deploy Mobile IPv6. The deployment scenarios are discussed in terms of integration with Hierarchical Mobile IPv6 and Network Mobility support. The scenarios and considerations described in this document will be the basis for further analysis to archieve optimization of Mobile IPv6 deployment.
